targets.query:
Warning = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) => 
     r._measurement == "node" and 
     r._field == "status_warnings" and 
     r.network == "${network}"
     )

Error = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "status_errors" and 
    r.network == "${network}" 
  )

  join(
    tables: {status_warnings:Warning, status_errors:Error},
    on: ["_time", "_stop", "_start", "host", "name", "url", "network", "_measurement"],
)

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    Final: if r._value_status_errors >= 1 then
      0
    else if r._value_status_warnings >= 1 then
      1
    else 3
    })
    )

SELECT max("response_result_data_Pool_info_Total_nodes_count") - max("response_result_data_Pool_info_f_value") FROM "node" WHERE ("network"::tag =~ /^$network$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "node_status_errors" and
    r.network == "${network}"
  )
  |> yield()
SELECT mean("response_result_data_Node_info_Metrics_average-per-second_read-transactions") FROM "node" WHERE ("network"::tag =~ /^$network$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "response_result_data_Pool_info_Read_only" and
    r.network == "${network}"
  )
  |> yield()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "response_result_data_Node_info_Mode" and
    r.network == "${network}"
  )
  |> yield()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "status_ok" and
    r.network == "${network}"
  )

|> toInt()

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node" WITH KEY = "network"
list.label: Network
list.name: network

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node" WITH KEY = "network"
